titleStmt.title: The character of Italy or, The Italian anatomiz'd. / by An English chyrurgion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nath. Brooke at the Angel in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf bears the printer's device of Nathaniel Brooke on verso.
With three final pages of advertisements.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
